thread.title_full: Korbin Forrister Pre-Race Party at Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery

title: Korbin Forrister Pre-Race Party at Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery
text:
Korbin Forrister Pre-Race Party at Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery Where 
3545 Las Vegas Blvd., L-26 Las Vegas, NV 89109 
7:30 p.m. Friday, Oct. 2, 2015 Categories 
Events, Food | Wine, Sports The Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery is thrilled to announce a partnership with NASCAR driver Korbin Forrister beginning with the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series race at Las Vegas Motor Speedway Oct. 3. Four of the World Famous Tilted Kilt Girls will accompany Forrister at Las Vegas to cheer on the driver in their Kilt Girl costumes. The Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery will host a pre-race party Oct. 2 at the Linq location in Las Vegas for all NASCAR fans. Forrister will be on hand to greet fans and sign autographs during the event. The official Tilted Kilt branded truck also will be parked in front of the venue for photo opportunities.
